title: Scope Functions Practice
description: Use let, apply, and also to configure and transform an object.
instructions: Create a MutableList, use apply to add items, also to print the size, and let to transform the result. Print the final uppercase list.

hints.text: apply returns the receiver object after executing the block
also is like apply but uses 'it' instead of 'this'
let transforms the object and returns the lambda result

commonMistakes.mistake: Confusing apply and let return values
commonMistakes.consequence: apply returns receiver, let returns lambda result
commonMistakes.correction: Use apply for configuration, let for transformation
Inside apply, call methods directly on this
Use each scope function for its intended purpose
